title: shakthi vinaayakaa
sahitya:
shakti vinAyaka sajjana tAraka sadguNa nAyakA brOvumu



anupallavi



 bhukti muktiprada bhUsura sEvita shaktidhara sahOdara gambhIra



caraNam



 bAlacandravara pAshAnkusha dharalOla mana karalOcana dhrtavara

mUlAdhAra sthita mOdakapriya guNashIla harikEsha bAla krpAla
